ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B IMPACT SWEA Level-2 Survey electron moments
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the moments of the electron distribution function at the SURVEY cadence (30 s) computed from the distribution function. It must be noted that, owing to measurement limitations in the low energy range, the moments are only partial moments calculated for energies above 50 eV. The dataset comprises the partial density, temperatures, and heat flux.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Data provided are publicly available. If used in presentations or publications, please acknowledge STEREO/Waves Investigation (M. Maksimovic and S. D. Bale, PIs). We recommend the data users to contact the STEREO/Waves team early in their study. For reporting purposes, we request bibliography information for any publication, etc., using these data. Please send information on the use of this data to: M. Maksimovic (PI). We suggest to add the following lines into the acknowledgments: The authors acknowledge CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales), CNRS (Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique), and Observatoire de Paris for support to the STEREO/Waves team and the CDPP (Centre de Donn√©es de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of the STEREO/Waves data. The following paper should also be used to reference: - Bougeret et al, Space Science Reviews, 2008, doi:10.1007/s11214-007-9298-8 - Krupar et al., Journal of Geophysical Research, 2012, doi:10.1029/2011JA017333

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron density
Parameter.Caveats: It must be noted that, owing to measurement limitations in the low energy range, the moments are only partial moments calculated for energies above 50 eV.

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA T_par_b_eV electron temperature along B
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tpar

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA T_per1_b electron temperature along B
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tper1

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA T_per2_b electron temperature along B
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tper2

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux Qr_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux in RTN Qr

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux Qt_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux in RTN Yt

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux Qn_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA heat flux in RTN Zn

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Br_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA B in RTN used in moments computation Br

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Bt_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA B in RTN used in moments computation Bt

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Bn_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA B in RTN used in moments computation Bn

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux Qpar
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux along B

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA electron heat flux Qper
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA electronheat flux perpendicular to B
